contents.text: Welcome to New Relic in San Francisco, providing real-time insights to help your software-driven business innovate faster.
For sales and pricing information, press 1.
For a product demonstration of our analytics platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist for your product demo.

navigationGoals: I need a quick walkthrough of your analytics platform features.
I’d like a live demo of your analytics platform for my veteran-run application
I want a live demo of New Relic's analytics platform focusing on APM and log management.
Show me a live demonstration of your analytics platform.
Schedule a walkthrough of the analytics dashboard to see how it could support my research monitoring needs

contents.text: For pricing, licensing, and contract questions, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our pricing and licensing team.

navigationGoals: I want detailed pricing and licensing options for my team.
I need details on pricing tiers, licensing options, and any veteran or non-profit discounts
I need detailed pricing tiers and enterprise licensing info for our deployment.
Explain your pricing, licensing options, and contract details.
Ask about subscription tiers, license limits, and contract duration for academic use

contents.text: For technical support and account services, press 2.
For developer tool integration and API support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: I need help integrating your API into our development workflow.
I need help integrating your developer API into my server environment
Help me integrate New Relic's REST API with my microservices architecture.
Help me integrate your API into my application.
Get help setting up the New Relic API to monitor my physics simulation code

contents.text: For billing and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to billing and account services.

navigationGoals: I want to straighten out a discrepancy on my recent bill.
I want to update my billing information and review last month’s invoice
I want to update my payment method and review my subscription invoices.
Assist me in reviewing my billing statement and account charges.
Update my payment method and review my current account charges
